sentences.sContent: The couple wanted to adopt a black child they had been fostering.
sentences.sCn: 那对夫妇想收养他们代养的一个黑人小孩。

synos.tran: 培养；养育，抚育；抱（希望等）

phrases.pCn: 寄养家庭；抚养孤儿的家庭
n. 朱迪·福斯特（美国女演员）

remMethod.val: fost(看作fast， 快速的) + er → 促进； 培养

trans.tranOther: to take someone else’s child into your family for a period of time but without becoming their legal parent
